trans-unit.source: The following steps can be used to perform a rolling upgrade between minor versions of MariaDB (for example from MariaDB 10.3.12 to MariaDB 10.3.13) when Galera Cluster is being used. In a rolling upgrade, each node is upgraded individually, so the cluster is always operational. There is no downtime from the application's perspective.
trans-unit.target: 使用Galera Cluster时，可以使用以下步骤在较小版本的MariaDB之间执行滚动升级（例如，从MariaDB 10.3.12到MariaDB 10.3.13）。在滚动升级中，每个节点都是单独升级的，因此群集始终可以运行。从应用程序的角度来看，没有停机时间。

trans-unit.source: The following steps can be used to perform a rolling upgrade from MariaDB 10.1 to MariaDB 10.2 when using Galera Cluster. In a rolling upgrade, each node is upgraded individually, so the cluster is always operational. There is no downtime from the application's perspective.

trans-unit.target: 使用Galera Cluster时，可以使用以下步骤执行从MariaDB 10.3到MariaDB 10.4的滚动升级。在滚动升级中，每个节点都是单独升级的，因此群集始终可以运行。从应用程序的角度来看，没有停机时间。

trans-unit.source: The fstab file must be set up (/etc/fstab). These entries would need to be added to each PM pointing to the all the dbroot(s) being used on all PMs. The 'noauto' option indicates that all dbroots will be associated to every PM but will not be automatically mounted at server startup. The associated dbroots that are assigned to each PM will be specifically mounted to that PM at Columnstore startup.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置fstab文件(/etc/fstab)。这些条目需要被添加到每个PM上,指向所有PM上使用的所有dbroot。noauto'选项表示所有的dbroots将被关联到每个PM上,但不会在服务器启动时自动挂载。分配给每个PM的相关dbroots将在Columnstore启动时被特别挂载到该PM上。

trans-unit.source: The fstab file on all Performance Modules must include all of the external mounts, all with the 'noauto' option specified. ColumnStore will manage the mounting and unmounting.
trans-unit.target: 所有性能模块的fstab文件必须包括所有的外部挂载,所有的挂载都必须指定'noauto'选项。ColumnStore将管理挂载和卸载。

trans-unit.source: The handlers in effect at any point is part of each thread's runtime state, so we need to push and pop handlers in the sp_rcontext during execution. We use special instructions for this: - sp_instr_hpush_jump Push a handler. The instruction contains the necessary information, like which conditions we handle and the location of the handler. The jump takes us to the location after the handler code. - sp_instr_hpop Pop the handlers of the current frame (which we are just leaving).
trans-unit.target: 任何时候生效的处理程序都是每个线程运行时状态的一部分,所以我们需要在执行过程中推送和弹出sp_rcontext中的处理程序。我们使用特殊的指令来实现。-sp_instr_hpush_jump 推送一个处理程序。该指令包含了必要的信息,比如我们处理的条件和处理程序的位置。跳转将我们带到处理程序代码之后的位置。-sp_instr_hpop 弹出当前帧(我们刚刚离开)的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The history of FederatedX is derived from the History of Federated. Cisco needed a MySQL storage engine that would allow them to consolidate remote tables on some sort of routing device, being able to interact with these remote tables as if they were local to the device, but not actually on the device, since the routing device had only so much storage space. The first prototype of the Federated Storage Engine was developed by JD (need to check on this- Brian Aker can verify) using the HANDLER interface. Brian handed the code to Patrick Galbraith and explained how it needed to work, and with Brian and Monty's tutelage and Patrick had a working Federated Storage Engine with MySQL 5.0. Eventually, Federated was released to the public in a MySQL 5.0 release.
trans-unit.target: FederatedX的历史来源于Federated的历史。思科需要一个MySQL存储引擎,允许他们在某种路由设备上整合远程表,能够与这些远程表进行交互,好像它们是设备的本地表,但实际上并不在设备上,因为路由设备的存储空间只有这么多。Federated Storage Engine的第一个原型是由JD(需要查证--Brian Aker可以验证)使用HANDLER接口开发的。Brian把代码交给了Patrick Galbraith,并解释了它需要如何工作,在Brian和Monty的指导下,Patrick用MySQL 5.0有了一个可以使用的Federated存储引擎。最终,Federated在MySQL 5.0版本中对外发布。

trans-unit.source: The idea here is to have a sliding window of partitions. Let's say you need to purge news articles after 30 days. The "partition key" would be the datetime (or timestamp) that is to be used for purging, and the PARTITIONs would be "range". Every night, a cron job would come along and build a new partition for the next day, and drop the oldest partition.
trans-unit.target: 这里的想法是要有一个分区的滑动窗口。假设您需要在30天后清除新闻报道。“分区键”将是用于清除的日期时间（或时间戳记），而“分区”将是“范围”。每天晚上，都会进行cron作业，并在第二天建立一个新分区，并删除最旧的分区。

trans-unit.source: The idea is that InnoDB recovery would make it point-in-time consistent.
trans-unit.target: 这个想法是,InnoDB恢复会使其时间点一致。

trans-unit.source: The idea is that the BACKUP LOCK should be held for as short a time as possible by the backup tool. The time to take an uncontested lock is very short! One can easily do 50,000 locks/unlocks per second on low end hardware.
trans-unit.target: 想法是备份工具应将 BACKUP LOCK 保持的时间尽可能短。进行无争议的锁定的时间非常短！在低端硬件上，每秒可以轻松完成50,000次锁定/解锁。

trans-unit.source: The idea is to check part of the WHERE condition that refers to index fields (we call it Pushed Index Condition) as soon as we've accessed the index. If the Pushed Index Condition is not satisfied, we won't need to read the whole table record.
trans-unit.target: 这个想法是在访问索引后立即检查引用索引字段的WHERE条件的一部分（我们称其为Pushed Index Condition）。如果不满足“ 推送索引条件”，则无需读取整个表记录。

trans-unit.source: The idea is to run the semi-join as if it were a regular inner join, and then eliminate the duplicate record combinations using a temporary table.
trans-unit.target: 我们的想法是把半连接当作普通的内部连接来运行,然后使用临时表消除重复的记录组合。

trans-unit.source: The idea of "derived table with key" optimization is to let the materialized derived table have one key which is used for joins with other tables.
trans-unit.target: "带键的派生表 "的优化思路是让物化的派生表只有一个键,用于与其他表的连接。

trans-unit.source: The idea of Table Pullout
trans-unit.target: 桌子拉手的概念

trans-unit.source: The idea with group commit is to amortize the costs of each flush to disk over multiple commits from multiple parallel transactions. For example, if there are 10 transactions trying to commit in parallel, then we can force all of them to be flushed disk at once with a single system call, rather than do one system call for each commit. This can greatly reduce the need for flush operations, and can consequently greatly improve the throughput of transactions-per-second (TPS).
trans-unit.target: 组提交的想法是将每次刷新磁盘的成本分摊到多个并行事务的多次提交中。例如,如果有10个事务试图并行提交,那么我们可以通过一次系统调用强制将所有事务一次性刷新到磁盘,而不是每次提交都做一次系统调用。这样可以大大减少对刷新操作的需求,从而可以大大提高每秒钟事务的吞吐量(TPS)。

trans-unit.source: The ideal size of the query cache is very dependent on the specific needs of each system. Setting a value too small will result in query results being dropped from the cache when they could potentially be re-used later. Setting a value too high could result in reduced performance due to lock contention, as the query cache is locked during updates.
trans-unit.target: 查询缓存的理想大小取决于每个系统的具体需求。设置太小的值会导致查询结果在以后有可能被重新使用时被从缓存中删除。设置值过高会导致性能降低,因为在更新过程中,查询缓存会被锁定。

trans-unit.source: The implementation and behavior of this feature is different than the same feature in MySQL 5.6.
trans-unit.target: 该功能的实现和行为与MySQL 5.6中的相同功能不同。

trans-unit.source: The implementation is described in MDEV-4506.
trans-unit.target: 该实现在MDEV-4506中进行了描述。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of the algorithm in 5.3 heavily exploits the multi-range-read interface and its properties. The interface hides the actual mechanism of fetching possible candidates for matching records from the table to be joined. As any block based join algorithm the BKA join repeatedly fills the join buffer with records of the first operand and for each refill it finds records from the join table that could match the records in the buffer. To find such records it asks the MRR interface to perform index look-ups with the keys constructed over all records from the buffer. Together with each key the interface receives a return address - a reference to the record over which this key has been constructed. The actual implementation functions of the MRR interface organize and optimize somehow the process of fetching the records of the joined table by the received keys. Each fetched record r2 is appended with the return address associated with the key by which the record has been found and the result is passed to the BKA join procedure. The procedure takes the record r1 from the join buffer by the return address, joins it with r2 and checks the join condition. If the condition is evaluated to true the joined records is sent to the result stream of the join operation. So for each record returned by the MRR interface only one record from the join buffer is accessed. The number of records from table t2 fetched by the BKA join is exactly the same as for the regular nested loops join algorithm. Yet BKA join allows to optimize the order in which the records are fetched.
trans-unit.target: 5.3中算法的实现大量利用了多范围读取接口及其属性。该接口隐藏了从待连接表中获取匹配记录的可能候选者的实际机制。和任何基于块的连接算法一样,BKA连接用第一个操作数的记录反复填充连接缓冲区,对于每一次填充,它都会从连接表中找到可能与缓冲区中的记录相匹配的记录。为了找到这样的记录,它要求MRR接口用在缓冲区中所有记录上构造的键来执行索引查找。与每个键一起,接口会收到一个返回地址--对这个键所构造的记录的引用。MRR接口的实际实现功能在某种程度上组织和优化了通过接收到的键来获取加入表的记录的过程。每一条取到的记录r2都附加了与该记录被找到的键相关联的返回地址,并将结果传递给BKA join过程。该存储过程从连接缓冲区中按返回地址获取记录r1,将其与r2连接,并检查连接条件。如果条件被评估为真,则加入的记录被发送到加入操作的结果流中。所以MRR接口返回的每一条记录,只访问加入缓冲区的一条记录。BKA join从表t2中获取的记录数与常规嵌套循环join算法完全相同。然而BKA join允许优化记录的获取顺序。

trans-unit.source: The key differentiator between a Fusion-io and a legacy SSD/HDD is the following: A Fusion-io card is connected directly on the system bus (PCIe), this enables high data transfer throughput (1.5 GB/s, 3.0 GB/s or 6GB/s) and the fast direct memory access (DMA) method can be used to transfer data. The ATA/SATA protocol stack is omitted and therefore latency is cut short. Fusion-io performance is dependent on server speed: the faster processors and the newer PCIe-bus version you have, the better is the ioDrive performance. Fusion-io memory is non-volatile, in other words, data remains on the card even when the server is powered off.
trans-unit.target: Fusion-io和旧版SSD / HDD之间的主要区别在于：Fusion-io卡直接连接在系统总线（PCIe）上，这可实现高数据传输吞吐量（1.5 GB / s，3.0 GB / s）或6GB / s）和快速直接内存访问（DMA）方法可用于传输数据。省略了ATA / SATA协议栈，因此缩短了等待时间。Fusion-io的性能取决于服务器的速度：处理器越快，拥有的PCIe总线版本越新，ioDrive的性能就越好。Fusion-io内存是非易失性的，换句话说，即使关闭服务器电源，数据也会保留在卡上。

trans-unit.source: The limiting factor of the Version Buffer is not the number of rows being updated, but rather the number of disk blocks. You can increase the size, but use caution, since increasing the number of disk blocks means that UPDATE and DELETE statements that run for long periods of time can take even longer in the event that you need to roll back the changes.

If the ACCEPT option is set to true (Y or 1) columns that do not exist in some of the sub-tables are accepted and their value will be null or pseudo-null (this depends on the nullability of the column) for the tables not having this column. The column types can also be different and an automatic conversion will be done if necessary.

trans-unit.source: The main benefit of storing things in an S3 compatible storage is that the cost of storage is much cheaper than many other alternatives. Many S3 implementations also provide reliable long-term storage.
trans-unit.target: 在S3兼容的存储中存储东西的主要好处是,存储成本比许多其他替代方案便宜得多。许多S3实现还提供可靠的长期存储。

trans-unit.source: The main characteristic of CONNECT is to enable accessing data scattered on a machine as if it was a centralized database. This, and the fact that that locking is not used by connect (data files are open and closed for each query) makes CONNECT very useful for importing or exporting data into or from a MariaDB database and also for all types of Business Intelligence applications. However, it is not suited for transactional applications.
trans-unit.target: CONNECT的主要特征是允许访问分散在计算机上的数据，就像它是集中式数据库一样。这以及连接未使用锁定（每个查询都会打开和关闭数据文件）这一事实，使得CONNECT对于在MariaDB数据库中或从MariaDB数据库中导入或导出数据以及所有类型的Business Intelligence应用程序都非常有用。但是，它不适用于事务性应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The main cookbook skips over an important optimization that is sometimes used. The optimizer will sometimes ignore the WHERE and, instead, use an INDEX that matches the ORDER BY. This, of course, needs to be a perfect match -- all columns, in the same order. And all ASC or all DESC.
trans-unit.target: 主食谱跳过了一个有时会用到的重要优化。优化器有时会忽略WHERE,而使用与ORDER BY匹配的INDEX。当然,这需要完美匹配--所有列,顺序相同。而且是全部ASC或全部DESC。

trans-unit.source: The main difference between the CAST() and CONVERT() is that CONVERT(expr,type) is ODBC syntax while CAST(expr as type) and CONVERT(... USING ...) are SQL92 syntax.

trans-unit.source: The main mechanism used in replication is the binary log. If binary logging is enabled, all updates to the database (data manipulation and data definition) are written into the binary log as binlog events. Slaves read the binary log from each master in order to access the data to replicate. A relay log is created on the slave server, using the same format as the binary log, and this is used to perform the replication. Old relay log files are removed when no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: 复制中使用的主要机制是二进制日志。如果启用了二进制日志记录，则对数据库的所有更新（数据操作和数据定义）都将作为binlog事件写入二进制日志中。从站从每个主站读取二进制日志，以访问要复制的数据。甲中继日志被从属服务器上创建，使用相同格式作为二进制日志，并且这被用于执行复制。不再需要旧的中继日志文件时，将其删除。

trans-unit.target: 这里的主要服务器系统变量是innodb_change_buffering，它确定使用哪种形式的更改缓冲（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: The main way to avoid swapping is to make sure you have enough RAM for all processes that need to run on the machine. Setting the system variables too high can mean that under load the server runs short of memory, and needs to use swap. So understanding what settings to use and how these impact your server's memory usage is critical.
trans-unit.target: 避免交换的主要方法是确保您有足够的RAM供计算机上需要运行的所有进程使用。将系统变量设置得太高可能意味着服务器在负载不足时运行的内存不足，需要使用swap。因此，了解使用哪些设置以及这些设置如何影响服务器的内存使用至关重要。

trans-unit.source: The major categories of job steps are the application of a column filter, processing table joins, and the projection of returned columns. Each operation in the query plan executes in parallel by the Job List itself and has the capability of running entirely on the User Module, entirely on the Performance Module or in some combination.
trans-unit.target: 作业步骤的主要类别是应用列过滤、处理表的连接和返回列的投影。查询计划中的每一项操作都由作业列表本身并行执行,并具有完全在用户模块上运行、完全在性能模块上运行或某种组合的能力。

trans-unit.source: The maximum total size of MEMORY tables cannot exceed the max_heap_table_size system server variable. When a table is created this value applies to that table, and when the server is restarted this value applies to existing tables. Changing this value has no effect on existing tables. However, executing a ALTER TABLE ... ENGINE=MEMORY statement applies the current value of max_heap_table_size to the table. Also, it is possible to change the session value of max_heap_table_size before creating a table, to make sure that tables created by other sessions are not affected.
trans-unit.target: MEMORY表的最大总大小不能超过 max_heap_table_size 系统服务器变量。创建表时，该值适用于该表，并且当服务器重新启动时，该值适用于现有表。更改此值对现有表没有影响。但是，执行 ALTER TABLE ... ENGINE=MEMORY 语句 max_heap_table_size 的当前值应用于表。另外，可以在创建表之前更改 max_heap_table_size 的会话值，以确保其他会话创建的表不受影响。

trans-unit.source: The most common way that binlog sequence gets different between servers is when the user/DBA does updates directly on a slave server (and these updates are written into the slaves binlog). This results in events in the slaves binlog that are not present on the master or any other slaves. This can be avoided by setting the session variable sql_log_bin false while doing such updates, so they do not go into the binlog.
trans-unit.target: 最常见的binlog序列在不同服务器之间发生变化的方式是当用户/DBA直接在从属服务器上进行更新时(这些更新被写入到从属binlog中),这将导致从属binlog中的事件在主服务器或任何其他从属服务器上不存在。这就会导致从服务器binlog中的事件在主服务器或其他从服务器上不存在。在做这种更新时,可以通过设置会话变量sql_log_bin false来避免这种情况,这样它们就不会被写入binlog中。

trans-unit.source: The most recent changes in the code are aimed at meeting the OpenGIS requirements. One thing missed in previous versions is that the functions which check spatial relations didn't consider the actual shape of an object, instead they operate only on their bounding rectangles. These legacy functions have been left as they are and new, properly-working functions are named with an 'ST_' prefix, in accordance with the latest OpenGIS requirements. Also, operations over geometry features were added.
trans-unit.target: 代码中的最新更改旨在满足OpenGIS要求。以前版本中遗漏的一件事是，检查空间关系的函数没有考虑对象的实际形状，而是仅对边界矩形进行操作。这些遗留功能按 ST_ ，根据最新的OpenGIS要求，可以正常工作的新功能以“ ST_ ”前缀命名。此外，还增加了对几何特征的操作。

trans-unit.source: The most recent changes in the code are aimed at meeting the OpenGIS requirements. One thing missing in the present version is that the functions which check spatial relations don't consider the actual shape of an object, instead they operate only on their bounding rectangles. These legacy functions have been left as they are, and new, properly-working functions are named with an 'ST_' prefix, in accordance with the last OpenGIS requirements. Also, operations over geometry features were added.
trans-unit.target: 代码中的最新更改旨在满足OpenGIS要求。当前版本中缺少的一件事是，检查空间关系的函数未考虑对象的实际形状，而是仅在其边界矩形上操作。这些遗留功能按原样保留，并且根据最新的OpenGIS要求，使用“ ST_ ”前缀命名可以正常使用的新功能。此外，还增加了对几何特征的操作。

trans-unit.source: The new buffer pool size must be a multiple of innodb_buffer_pool_chunk_size * innodb_buffer_pool_instances. If you attempt to set a different figure, the value is automatically adjusted to a multiple of at least the attempted size. Note that adjusting the innodb_buffer_pool_chunk_size setting can result in a change in the buffer pool size.
trans-unit.target: 新的缓冲池大小必须是innodb_buffer_pool_chunk_size * innodb_buffer_pool_instances的倍数。如果尝试设置其他数字，则该值将自动调整为至少为尝试的大小的倍数。请注意，调整innodb_buffer_pool_chunk_size设置可能会导致缓冲池大小发生变化。

trans-unit.source: The new node only needs to connect to one of the existing cluster nodes. Once it connects to one of the existing cluster nodes, it will be able to see all of the nodes in the cluster. However, it is generally better to list all nodes of the cluster in wsrep_cluster_address, so that any node can join a cluster by connecting to any of the other cluster nodes, even if one or more of the cluster nodes are down. It is even OK to list a node's own IP address in wsrep_cluster_address, since Galera Cluster is smart enough to ignore it.
trans-unit.target: 新节点仅需要连接到现有群集节点之一。一旦连接到现有集群节点之一，便可以查看集群中的所有节点。但是，通常最好在 wsrep_cluster_address 中列出集群的所有节点，以使任何一个节点都可以通过连接到任何其他集群节点来加入集群，即使一个或多个集群节点已关闭也是如此。甚至可以在 wsrep_cluster_address 中列出节点自己的IP地址，因为Galera Cluster非常聪明，可以忽略它。

trans-unit.source: The normal way to count "Unique Users" is to take large log files, sort by userid, dedup, and count. This requires a rather large amount of processing. Furthermore, the count derived cannot be rolled up. That is, daily counts cannot be added to get weekly counts -- some users will be counted multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 一般统计 "Unique Users "的方法是取大的日志文件,按userid排序,dedup,然后计数。这需要相当大的处理量。此外,得出的计数不能滚动。也就是说,不能将每天的计数加起来得到每周的计数--有些用户会被多次计算。

trans-unit.source: The normal way to set up a new replication slave is to take a backup from an existing server (either a master or slave in the replication topology), and then restore that backup on the server acting as the new slave, and the configure it to start replicating from the appropriate position in the master's binary log.
trans-unit.target: 设置新的复制从站的正常方法是从现有服务器(复制拓扑中的主站或从站)获取备份,然后在作为新从站的服务器上还原该备份,并配置它从主站二进制日志的适当位置开始复制。

trans-unit.source: The notation with exponent can be used. The exponent is preceded by an E or e character. The exponent can be preceded by a sign and must be an integer. A number N with an exponent part X, is calculated as N * POW(10, X).

trans-unit.source: The old behavior, with 3 syncs to disk per (group) commit (and consequently lower performance), can be selected with the new innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit=3 option. There is normally no benefit to doing this, however there are a couple of edge cases to be aware of.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用新的 innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit=3 选项选择具有（每次（组））提交与磁盘同步3次的旧行为（因此会降低性能）。这样做通常没有任何好处，但是有一些边缘情况需要注意。

trans-unit.source: The one table has one row per entity, and can grow as needed. (EAV needs many rows per entity.)
trans-unit.target: 一张表每个实体只有一行,可以根据需要增加。(每个实体需要许多行)。

trans-unit.target: 在线EXPLAIN Analyzer工具具有开放的API，允许客户端应用程序将其发送给EXPLAIN。

trans-unit.source: The online EXPLAIN Analyzer tool has an open API to allow client applicatio...
trans-unit.target: 在线EXPLAIN分析工具有一个开放的API,允许客户端应用。

trans-unit.source: The only authentication plugins that this clause supports are mysql_native_password and mysql_old_password.
trans-unit.target: 该子句支持的唯一身份验证插件是 mysql_native_password 和 mysql_old_password 。

trans-unit.source: The only SST method of this type is the mysqldump SST method, which actually uses the mysqldump utility to get a logical dump of the donor. This SST method requires the joiner node to be fully initialized and ready to accept connections before the transfer. This method is, by definition, blocking, in that it blocks the donor node from modifying its own state for the duration of the transfer. It is also the slowest of all, and that might be an issue in a cluster with a lot of load.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型的唯一SST方法是 mysqldump SST方法，该方法实际上使用 mysqldump 实用程序来获取施主的逻辑转储。此SST方法要求联接器节点已完全初始化，并准备在传输之前接受连接。根据定义，此方法是阻塞的，因为它在传输期间会阻止施主节点修改其自身的状态。它也是最慢的，这在负载很大的集群中可能是个问题。

trans-unit.source: The only aggregated functions in the SELECT part are MIN() and MAX() functions and all of them using the same column which is the next index part after the used GROUP BY columns.
trans-unit.target: SELECT 部分中唯一的聚合函数是 MIN() 和 MAX() 函数，它们全部使用同一列，该列是使用的 GROUP BY 列之后的下一个索引部分。

trans-unit.source: The only algorithm that MariaDB currently supports to encrypt the key file is Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) mode of Advanced Encryption Standard (AES).
trans-unit.target: MariaDB当前唯一支持加密密钥文件的算法是高级加密标准（AES）的密码块链接（CBC）模式。

trans-unit.source: The only algorithm that MariaDB currently supports when decrypting the key file is Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) mode of Advanced Encryption Standard (AES). The encryption key size can be 128-bits, 192-bits, or 256-bits. The encryption key is calculated by taking a SHA-1 hash of the encryption password.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB当前在解密密钥文件时唯一支持的算法是高级加密标准（AES）的密码块链接（CBC）模式。加密密钥的大小可以是128位，192位或256位。加密密钥是通过对加密密码进行SHA-1哈希计算得出的。

trans-unit.source: The only data modifying operations are the INSERT , UPDATE and DELETE commands. They can be executed successfully only if the data source database or tables are not read/only.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的数据修改操作是INSERT，UPDATE和DELETE命令。仅当数据源数据库或表不是只读/只读时，它们才能成功执行。

trans-unit.source: The only difference is that the "multiple" node is an intermediate node in the path. The resulting table can be seen with a query such as:
trans-unit.target: 唯一不同的是,"多个 "节点是路径中的一个中间节点。通过查询可以看到结果的表,如:。

trans-unit.source: The only difference is the tabname option now referring to the rt1, rt2, and rt3 tables. However, even if it works, this is not the best way to do it. This is because accessing a table via the MySQL API is done twice per table. Once by CONNECT to access the FEDERATED table on the local server, then a second time by FEDERATED engine to access the remote table.
trans-unit.target: 唯一不同的是tabname选项现在指的是rt1、rt2和rt3表。然而,即使它有效,这也不是最好的方法。这是因为通过MySQL API访问一个表,每个表要做两次。一次通过connect访问本地服务器上的federated表,然后第二次通过federated引擎访问远程表。

trans-unit.source: The only option with innodb_file_per_table = 0 is to dump ALL tables, remove ibdata*, restart, and reload. That is rarely worth the effort and time.
trans-unit.target: innodb_file_per_table = 0的唯一选项是转储所有表，除去ibdata *，重新启动并重新加载。这很少值得付出时间和精力。

trans-unit.source: The only possible long operations are getting the locks for the table and flushing the original key cache, if there were many key blocks for the file in it.
trans-unit.target: 唯一可能的长操作是获取表的锁和刷新原始密钥缓存,如果其中有很多文件的密钥块的话。

trans-unit.source: The only supported method currently is zlib.
trans-unit.target: 目前唯一支持的方法是zlib。

trans-unit.source: The open table cache can be emptied with FLUSH TABLES or with the flush-tables or refreshmysqladmin commands.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用FLUSH TABLES或 flush-tables 或 refresh mysqladmin命令清空打开的表缓存。

trans-unit.source: The operation inserts one record at a time into each index, which is very inefficient.
trans-unit.target: 该操作每次只在每个索引中插入一条记录,效率很低。

trans-unit.source: The operation is also crash safe. If the server is killed while executing an instant ALTER TABLE ... ADD COLUMN, when the table is restored InnoDB integrates the new column, flattening the table definition.
trans-unit.target: 该操作也是碰撞安全的。如果在执行即时 ALTER TABLE ... ADD COLUMN 时服务器被杀死，则在还原表时，InnoDB会集成新列，并展平表定义。

trans-unit.source: The operation might also have to write a temporary log file to track data changes by DML queries executed during the operation. The maximum size for this log file is configured by the innodb_online_alter_log_max_size system variable.
trans-unit.target: 该操作可能还必须写入一个临时日志文件，以跟踪操作期间执行的DML查询对数据的更改。此日志文件的最大大小由 innodb_online_alter_log_max_size 系统变量配置。

trans-unit.source: The operation might have to write sort files in the directory defined by the innodb_tmpdir system variable.
trans-unit.target: 该操作可能必须在由 innodb_tmpdir 系统变量定义的目录中写入排序文件。

trans-unit.source: The operation will have to create a temporary table to perform the the table copy. This temporary table will be in the same directory as the original table, and it's file name will be in the format #sql${PID}_${THREAD_ID}_${TMP_TABLE_COUNT}, where ${PID} is the process ID of mysqld, ${THREAD_ID} is the connection ID, and ${TMP_TABLE_COUNT} is the number of temporary tables that the connection has open. Therefore, the datadir may contain files with file names like #sql1234_12_1.ibd.
trans-unit.target: 该操作将必须创建一个临时表来执行表副本。该临时表将在同一目录与原始表，它的文件名是格式 #sql${PID}_${THREAD_ID}_${TMP_TABLE_COUNT} ，其中 ${PID} 是的进程ID mysqld ， ${THREAD_ID} 是连接ID， ${TMP_TABLE_COUNT} 是连接已打开的临时表的数量。因此， datadir 可能包含文件名，例如 #sql1234_12_1.ibd 的文件。

trans-unit.source: The opportunities for parallel replication on slaves can be highly increased if more transactions are committed in a group commit on the master. This can be tuned using the binlog_commit_wait_count and binlog_commit_wait_usec variables. If for example the application can tolerate up to 50 milliseconds extra delay for transactions on the master, one can set binlog_commit_wait_usec=50000 and binlog_commit_wait_count=20 to get up to 20 transactions at a time available for replication in parallel. Care must however be taken to not set binlog_commit_wait_usec too high, as this could cause significant slowdown for applications that run a lot of small transactions serially one after the other.
trans-unit.target: 如果在主服务器上的组提交中提交了更多事务，则从服务器上并行复制的机会会大大增加。可以使用binlog_commit_wait_count和binlog_commit_wait_usec变量进行调整。例如，如果应用程序最多可承受50毫秒的主服务器上的额外延迟，则可以将 binlog_commit_wait_usec=50000 和 binlog_commit_wait_count=20 设置为一次最多可获取20个事务以进行并行复制。但是必须注意不要设置 binlog_commit_wait_usec 太高，因为这可能会导致依次运行大量小事务的应用程序的运行速度大大降低。

trans-unit.source: The opposite, city-to-country way is not possible. This is not a semi-join.
trans-unit.target: 反之,城市到乡村的方式是不可能的。这不是一个半联动的方式。

trans-unit.source: The optimization is ON by default, it can be switched off like so:
trans-unit.target: 优化默认为ON,可以这样关闭。

trans-unit.source: The optimization is applied then the derived table could not be merged into its parent SELECT
trans-unit.target: 应用了优化,那么派生表就不能合并到它的父表SELECT中。

trans-unit.source: The optimization is controlled by the exists_to_in flag in optimizer_switch. Before MariaDB 10.0.12, the optimization was OFF by default. Since MariaDB 10.0.12, it has been ON by default.
trans-unit.target: 优化是由控制 exists_to_in 旗optimizer_switch。在MariaDB 10.0.12之前，优化默认情况下为OFF。从MariaDB 10.0.12开始，默认情况下为ON。

trans-unit.source: The optimization is enabled by default. It can be disabled with:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,该优化是启用的。它可以通过以下方式禁用:

trans-unit.source: The optimization is enabled by default. One can disable it by setting @@optimizer_switch flag condition_pushdown_for_derived to OFF.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下启用优化。可以通过将 @@optimizer_switch 标志 condition_pushdown_for_derived 设置为OFF 来禁用它。

trans-unit.source: The optimization needs to be supported by the storage engine. At the moment, it is supported by InnoDB and MyISAM. It is not supported in partitioned tables.
trans-unit.target: 这个优化需要存储引擎的支持。目前,InnoDB和MyISAM都支持。在分区表中不支持。

trans-unit.source: The optimization phase can do the following changes to the WHERE clause:
trans-unit.target: 优化阶段可以对 WHERE 子句进行以下更改：

trans-unit.source: The optimization was ported into MariaDB 10.0 in version 10.0.0. The server would not give any indication of whether the optimization was used, though. (This is how the feature was designed by Oracle. In MySQL 5.6, the only way one can see this feature is to examine the optimizer_trace, which is not currently supported by MariaDB).
trans-unit.target: 该优化已移植到版本10.0.0中的MariaDB 10.0中。但是，服务器不会提供有关是否使用优化的任何指示。（这是Oracle设计该功能的方式。在MySQL 5.6中，唯一可以看到此功能的方法是检查optimizer_trace，MariaDB当前不支持该功能）。

trans-unit.source: The optimizer chose to do a full scan over the materialized table, so this is an example of a use of the Materialization-Scan strategy.
trans-unit.target: 优化器选择了对物化表进行全面扫描,所以这是一个使用物化-扫描策略的例子。

trans-unit.source: The optimizer does various plan pruning and may discard the requested join order before it has a chance to find out that it is a million-times cheaper than any other.
trans-unit.target: 优化器会进行各种计划修剪,可能还没来得及发现所请求的加入订单比其他的便宜百万倍,就把它丢弃了。

trans-unit.source: The optimizer doesn't use data from statistics tables. Default for MariaDB 10.4.0 and below.
trans-unit.target: 优化器不使用统计表中的数据。MariaDB 10.4.0及更低版本的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: The optimizer is largely cost-based and will try to choose the optimal plan for any query. However in some cases it does not have enough information to choose a perfect plan and in these cases you may have to provide hints to force the optimizer to use another plan.
trans-unit.target: 优化器在很大程度上是基于成本的,并且会尝试为任何查询选择最佳的计划,但是在某些情况下,它没有足够的信息来选择完美的计划,在这些情况下,你可能需要提供提示来迫使优化器使用另一个计划。然而在某些情况下,它没有足够的信息来选择一个完美的计划,在这些情况下,你可能需要提供提示来迫使优化器使用另一个计划。

trans-unit.source: The optimizer makes a cost-based decision about when the filter should be used.
trans-unit.target: 优化器对何时使用过滤器做出基于成本的决定。

trans-unit.source: The optimizer starts a range scan on the salary index. We find the first record Babatunde, 1000. If we do an on-the-fly update, we immediately instruct the storage engine to change this record to be Babatunde, 1000+100=1100.
trans-unit.target: 优化器对薪水指数启动范围扫描。我们找到第一个记录Babatunde，1000。如果我们进行即时更新，我们会立即指示存储引擎将此记录更改为Babatunde，1000 + 100 = 1100。

trans-unit.source: The optimizer uses data from statistics tables if the same kind of data is not provided by the storage engine.
trans-unit.target: 如果存储引擎没有提供同类数据,优化器会使用统计表的数据。

trans-unit.source: The optimizer uses several strategies to optimize GROUP BY and ORDER BY:
trans-unit.target: 优化器使用几种策略来优化GROUP BY和ORDER BY：

trans-unit.source: The optimizer usually picks the "first" table based on these hints:
trans-unit.target: 优化器通常会根据这些提示来挑选 "第一个 "表。

trans-unit.source: The optimizer usually starts with one table and extracts the data needed from it. As it finds a useful (that is, matches the WHERE clause, if any) row, it reaches into the 'next' table. This is called NLJ ("Nested Loop Join"). The process of filtering and reaching to the next table continues through the rest of the tables.
trans-unit.target: 优化器通常从一张表开始,并从中提取所需的数据。当它找到有用的(也就是匹配WHERE子句,如果有的话)行时,它就会进入 "下一个 "表。这就是所谓的NLJ("Nested Loop Join")。筛选和到达下一个表的过程在其余的表中继续进行。

trans-unit.source: The optimizer will convert big IN predicates into subqueries.
trans-unit.target: 优化器会将大的IN谓词转换为子查询。

trans-unit.source: The optimizer will try its best to build a join plan which matches the specified join prefix. It does this by comparing join prefixes it is considering with @@debug_optimizer_prefer_join_prefix, and multiplying cost by a million if the plan doesn't match the prefix.
trans-unit.target: 优化器将尽力建立与指定连接前缀匹配的连接计划。它通过将要考虑的 @@debug_optimizer_prefer_join_prefix 前缀与@@ debug_optimizer_prefer_join_prefix进行比较来实现此目的，如果计划与前缀不匹配，则将成本乘以一百万。

trans-unit.source: The optimizer will try to use indexes to resolve ORDER BY and GROUP BY.
trans-unit.target: 优化器将尝试使用索引来解析ORDER BY和GROUP BY。

trans-unit.source: The option --check will be used by default, if no other options were specified. You can change the default behavior by making a symbolic link to the binary, or copying it somewhere with another name, the alternatives are:
trans-unit.target: 选项 --check 将默认使用，如果没有指定其他选项。您可以通过以下方式更改默认行为：建立指向二进制文件的符号链接，或将其复制到其他名称的其他位置，替代方法是：

trans-unit.source: The option read_binlog_speed_limit can be used to reduce such load, by limiting the speed at which events are downloaded. The limit is given as maximum kilobytes per second to download on one slave connection.
trans-unit.target: 通过限制事件的下载速度，选项read_binlog_speed_limit可用于减少此类负载。该限制以每秒最大千字节为单位（从一个从属连接下载）给出。

trans-unit.source: The option read_binlog_speed_limit is available starting from MariaDB 10.2.3.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.2.3开始，可以使用选项read_binlog_speed_limit。

trans-unit.source: The option can also be set in an option file in an option group supported by mysql_install_db. For example:

trans-unit.source: The option files within the directory are read in alphabetical order.

trans-unit.source: The option module gives the name of the DLL or shared library implementing the OEM wrapper for the table type. This library must be located in the plugin directory like all other plugins or UDF’s.

trans-unit.source: The option to disable the MariaDB ColumnStore User Module Replication is available since there are additional third party tools that can be used to do the Data Replication.
trans-unit.target: 由于有额外的第三方工具可以用来进行数据复制,所以可以选择禁用MariaDB ColumnStore用户模块复制。

trans-unit.source: The option value is passed to ulimit -c. Note that you need to start mysqld_safe as root for this to work properly.
trans-unit.target: 选项值传递到 ulimit -c 。注意，您需要以root用户身份启动 mysqld_safe 才能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: The option value is passed to ulimit -n. Note that you need to start mysqld_safe as root for this to work properly. However, you can't currently set this to unlimited. See MDEV-18410 about that.

trans-unit.source: The optional AND CHAIN clause is a convenience for initiating a new transaction as soon as the old transaction terminates. If AND CHAIN is specified, then there is effectively nothing between the old and new transactions, although they remain separate. The characteristics of the new transaction will be the same as the characteristics of the old one — that is, the new transaction will have the same access mode, isolation level and diagnostics area size (we'll discuss all of these shortly) as the transaction just terminated.
trans-unit.target: 可选的 AND CHAIN 子句为旧事务终止后启动新事务提供了便利。如果指定了 AND CHAIN ，则旧事务和新事务之间实际上没有任何关系，尽管它们保持分开。新事务的特征将与旧事务的特征相同-也就是说，新事务将具有与事务相同的访问模式，隔离级别和诊断区域大小（我们将在稍后讨论所有这些特征）刚刚终止。

trans-unit.source: The optional AND CHAIN clause is a convenience for initiating a new transaction as soon as the old transaction terminates. If AND CHAIN is specified, then there is effectively nothing between the old and new transactions, although they remain separate. The characteristics of the new transaction will be the same as the characteristics of the old one — that is, the new transaction will have the same access mode, isolation level and diagnostics area size (we'll discuss all of these shortly) as the transaction just terminated. The AND NO CHAIN option just tells your DBMS to end the transaction — that is, these four SQL statements are equivalent:
trans-unit.target: 可选的 AND CHAIN 子句为旧事务终止后启动新事务提供了便利。如果指定了 AND CHAIN ，则旧事务和新事务之间实际上没有任何关系，尽管它们保持分开。新事务的特征将与旧事务的特征相同-也就是说，新事务将具有与事务相同的访问模式，隔离级别和诊断区域大小（我们将在稍后讨论所有这些特征）刚刚终止。该 AND NO CHAIN 选项只是告诉你的DBMS结束交易-也就是说，这四个SQL语句是等价的：

trans-unit.source: The optional BLOCK_SIZE option gives the size of the table, defaulting to 1 if not specified. When its columns are not specified, it is almost equivalent to a SEQUENCE table “seq_1_to_Size”.
trans-unit.target: 可选的 BLOCK_SIZE 选项提供表的大小，如果未指定，则默认为1。如果未指定其列，则几乎等同于SEQUENCE表“ seq_1_to_Size”。

trans-unit.source: The optional IDENTIFIED BY PASSWORD clause can be used to provide an account with a password that has already been hashed. The password should be specified as a hash that was provided by the PASSWORD function. It will be stored to the mysql.user table as-is.
trans-unit.target: 可选的 IDENTIFIED BY PASSWORD 子句可用于为帐户提供已经被哈希处理的密码。密码应指定为 PASSWORD 函数提供的哈希值。它将按原样存储到 mysql.user 表中。

trans-unit.source: The optional IDENTIFIED BY clause can be used to provide an account with a password. The password should be specified in plain text. It will be hashed by the PASSWORD function prior to being stored to the mysql.user table.
trans-unit.target: 可选的 IDENTIFIED BY 子句可用于为帐户提供密码。密码应以纯文本形式指定。在存储到 mysql.user 表之前，将使用 PASSWORD 函数对其进行哈希处理。

trans-unit.source: The optional IDENTIFIED VIA authentication_plugin allows you to specify that the account should be authenticated by a specific authentication plugin. The plugin name must be an active authentication plugin as per SHOW PLUGINS. If it doesn't show up in that output, then you will need to install it with INSTALL PLUGIN or INSTALL SONAME.
trans-unit.target: 可选的 IDENTIFIED VIA authentication_plugin 允许您指定应该由特定的身份验证插件对帐户进行身份验证。根据 SHOW PLUGINS ，插件名称必须是活动的身份验证插件。如果它没有显示在输出中，则需要使用 INSTALL PLUGIN 或 INSTALL SONAME 进行安装。

trans-unit.source: The optional USING clause allows users to provide an authentication string to a plugin. The authentication string's format and meaning is completely defined by the plugin.
trans-unit.target: 可选的 USING 子句允许用户向插件提供身份验证字符串。认证字符串的格式和含义完全由插件定义。

trans-unit.source: The optional WITH ADMIN clause determines whether the current user, the current role or another user or role has use of the newly created role. If the clause is omitted, WITH ADMIN CURRENT_USER is treated as the default, which means that the current user will be able to GRANT this role to users.
trans-unit.target: 可选的 WITH ADMIN 子句确定当前用户，当前角色或另一个用户或角色是否使用了新创建的角色。如果省略该子句， WITH ADMIN CURRENT_USER 被视为默认值，这意味着当前的用户将能够 GRANT 这个角色给用户。

trans-unit.source: The optional WORK keyword is supported for COMMIT and ROLLBACK, as are the CHAIN and RELEASE clauses. CHAIN and RELEASE can be used for additional control over transaction completion. The value of the completion_type system variable determines the default completion behavior.
trans-unit.target: COMMIT 和 ROLLBACK 以及 CHAIN 和 RELEASE 子句均支持可选的 WORK 关键字。 CHAIN 和 RELEASE 可用于对事务完成进行额外控制。所述的值completion_type系统变量决定了默认完成行为。

trans-unit.source: The optional options flag can be set to 1 to add a bounding box to the output.
trans-unit.target: 可以将可选选项标志设置为 1 ,以将边界框添加到输出中。

trans-unit.source: The optional precision determines the microsecond precision. See Microseconds in MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 可选精度确定微秒精度。请参阅MariaDB中的微秒。

trans-unit.source: The optional ALGORITHM clause is an extension to standard SQL. It affects how MariaDB processes the view. ALGORITHM takes three values: MERGE, TEMPTABLE, or UNDEFINED. The default algorithm is UNDEFINED if no ALGORITHM clause is present. See View Algorithms for more information.
trans-unit.target: 可选的ALGORITHM子句是标准SQL的扩展。它影响MariaDB处理视图的方式。算法采用三个值：MERGE，TEMPTABLE或UNDEFINED。如果不存在ALGORITHM子句，则默认算法为UNDEFINED。有关更多信息，请参见查看算法。

trans-unit.source: The optional AS clause permits casting the input string to a binary or non-binary string, as well as to a particular length.
trans-unit.target: 可选的AS子句允许将输入字符串转换为二进制或非二进制字符串,以及特定的长度。

trans-unit.source: The optional LEVEL clause specifies that the return value should contain weights for specific collation levels. The levels specifier can either be a single integer, a comma-separated list of integers, or a range of integers separated by a dash (whitespace is ignored). Integers can range from 1 to a maximum of 6, dependent on the collation, and need to be listed in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 可选的LEVEL子句指定返回值应包含特定归类级别的权重。的 levels 说明符可以是一个整数，逗号分隔的整数的列表或范围内的整数的分离用破折号（空格被忽略）。根据排序规则，整数的范围可以从1到最大6，并且需要以升序列出。

trans-unit.source: The optional clause RESTART [ WITH restart ] sets the next value for the sequence. This is equivalent to calling the SETVAL() function with the is_used argument as 0. The specified value will be returned by the next call of nextval. Using RESTART with no restart value is equivalent to supplying the start value that was recorded by CREATE SEQUENCE or last set by ALTER SEQUENCE START WITH.
trans-unit.target: 可选子句 RESTART [ WITH restart ] 设置序列的下一个值。这等效于使用 is_used 参数为0 调用SETVAL（）函数。下一次调用nextval将返回指定的值。在没有重新启动值的情况下使用 RESTART 等效于提供由CREATE SEQUENCE记录或由 ALTER SEQUENCE START WITH 设置的最后一个起始值。

trans-unit.source: The optional name or pattern of the zip entry or entries to be used with the table. If not specified, all entries or only the first one will be used depending on the mulentries option setting.
trans-unit.target: 与表一起使用的一个或多个zip条目的可选名称或模式。如果未指定，则将使用全部条目或仅使用第一个条目，具体取决于mulentries选项设置。

trans-unit.source: The output is always accompanied with a warning which shows the query the target thread is running (this shows what the EXPLAIN is for):
trans-unit.target: 输出始终带有警告，该警告显示目标线程正在运行的查询（这显示 EXPLAIN 的作用）：

trans-unit.source: The output is useful to determine how much physical I/O was required, how much data was cached, and how many partition blocks were eliminated through use of extent map elimination. The system maintains min / max values for each extent and uses these to help implement where clause filters to completely bypass extents where the value is outside of the min/max range. When a column is ordered (or semi-ordered) during load such as a time column this offer very large performance gains as the system can avoid scanning many extents for the column.
trans-unit.target: 该输出对于确定需要多少物理I/O,多少数据被缓存,以及通过使用范围图消除多少分区块是有用的。系统为每个范围维护最小/最大值,并使用这些值来帮助实现where子句过滤器,以完全绕过值在最小/最大范围之外的范围。当一列在加载过程中是有序的(或半有序的),如时间列,这提供了非常大的性能提升,因为系统可以避免为该列扫描许多extents。

trans-unit.source: The percentile functions have a slightly different syntax from other window functions as can be seen in the example below. These functions can be only applied against numeric values. The argument to the function is the percentile to evaluate. Following 'within group' is the sort expression which indicates the sort column and optionally order. Finally after 'over' is an optional partition by clause, for no partition clause use 'over ()'. The example below utilizes the value 0.5 to calculate the median opportunity amount in the rows. The values differ sometimes because percentile_cont will return the average of the 2 middle rows for an even data set while percentile_desc returns the first encountered in the sort.
trans-unit.target: 百分位数函数的语法与其他窗口函数略有不同,如下例所示。这些函数只能针对数值应用。函数的参数是要评估的百分位数。在'within group'后面是排序表达式,它表示排序列和可选的顺序。最后在'over'之后是一个可选的partition by子句,对于没有partition子句的,使用'over ()'。下面的例子利用0.5的值来计算行中的机会金额中位数。数值有时会有所不同,因为percentile_cont会返回偶数数据集中间2行的平均数,而percentile_desc会返回排序中遇到的第一行。

trans-unit.source: The performance issues
trans-unit.target: 性能问题

trans-unit.source: The performance issues with innodb_file_per_table=ON can be exacerbated in cases where the InnoDB buffer pool is very large and innodb_adaptive_hash_index=ON is set. In that case, using DROP TABLE followed by CREATE TABLE instead of TRUNCATE TABLE may perform better. Setting innodb_adaptive_hash_index=OFF can also help. In MariaDB 10.2.19 and later, this performance can also be improved by setting innodb_safe_truncate=OFF. See MDEV-9459 for more details.
trans-unit.target: 如果InnoDB缓冲池很大并且设置了innodb_adaptive_hash_index = ON，则innodb_file_per_table = ON的性能问题可能会加剧。在这种情况下，使用DROP TABLE后跟CREATE TABLE而不是 TRUNCATE TABLE 可能会更好。设置innodb_adaptive_hash_index = OFF也可以提供帮助。在MariaDB 10.2.19和更高版本中，也可以通过设置innodb_safe_truncate = OFF来提高性能。有关更多详细信息，请参见MDEV-9459。

trans-unit.source: The performance of this is O(N), actually about 3N, where N is the number of source rows.
trans-unit.target: 其性能为O(N),实际约为3N,其中N为源行数。

trans-unit.source: The performance schema cannot be activated at runtime - it must be set when the server starts by adding the following line in your my.cnf configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 性能模式无法在运行时激活-必须在服务器启动时通过在 my.cnf 配置文件中添加以下行来进行设置。

trans-unit.source: The physical file ColumnStore writes to disk is called a segment file. Once segment files reach the maximum number of extents, ColumnStore automatically creates a new segment file. You can set the maximum number of extents in a segment file using ExtentsPreSegmentFile in the ColumnStore.xml file. It should be set to a multiple of the number of DB Roots. The default value is 2.
trans-unit.target: ColumnStore写入磁盘的物理文件称为段文件。一旦段文件达到最大扩展数，ColumnStore将自动创建一个新的段文件。您可以在使用片段文件扩展的最大数量 ExtentsPreSegmentFile 在 ColumnStore.xml 文件。应将其设置为数据库根数的倍数。预设值为2。

trans-unit.source: The previous paragraph doesn't cover one important question — how can the engine know that the server uses an outdated table definition? The answer is — by checking the tabledef_version, the table definition version. Every table gets a unique tabledef_version value. Normally it is generated automatically when a table is created. When a table is discovered the engine can force it to have a specific tabledef_version value (simply by setting it in the TABLE_SHARE before calling the init_from_binary_frm_image() or init_from_sql_statement_string() methods).
trans-unit.target: 上一段没有覆盖一个重要的问题-引擎如何知道服务器使用了过时的表定义？答案是-通过检查tabledef_version（表定义版本）。每个表都有一个唯一的 tabledef_version 值。通常，它是在创建表时自动生成的。当一个表被发现引擎可以迫使它有特定的 tabledef_version （只需在设置它的值 TABLE_SHARE 调用之前 init_from_binary_frm_image() 或 init_from_sql_statement_string() 方法）。

trans-unit.source: The previous statement creates an event named myevent. This event executes once — one hour following its creation — by running an SQL statement that increments the value of the myschema.mytable table's mycol column by 1.
trans-unit.target: 前面的语句创建一个名为myevent的事件。通过运行一条将myschema.mytable表的mycol列的值增加1的SQL语句，此事件在创建后一小时内执行一次。

trans-unit.source: The primary Performance Module has a master copy of the Extent Map. On system startup, the file is read into memory, then physically copied to all other participating User and Performance modules for disaster recovery and failover. Nodes keep the Extent Map in memory for quick access. As Extents are modified, updates are broadcast to participating nodes.
trans-unit.target: 主性能模块拥有Extent Map的主副本。在系统启动时,该文件被读取到内存中,然后物理复制到所有其他参与的用户和性能模块,以便进行灾难恢复和故障转移。节点将Extent Map保存在内存中,以便快速访问。随着 "扩展图 "的修改,更新将被广播到参与节点。

trans-unit.source: The primary purpose of innobackupex mode is to allow scripts and tools to more easily migrate to Mariabackup if they were originally designed to use the innobackupex utility that is included with Percona XtraBackup. It is not recommended to use this mode in new scripts, since it is not guaranteed to be supported forever. See MDEV-20552 for more information.
trans-unit.target: innobackupex 模式的主要目的是使脚本和工具最初设计为使用Percona XtraBackup附带的 innobackupex 实用工具，从而可以更轻松地迁移到Mariabackup。不建议在新脚本中使用此模式，因为不能保证永远支持该模式。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-20552。

trans-unit.source: The primary purpose of the User Module is to handle concurrency scaling. It never directly touches database files and doesn't require visibility to them. It uses a machine's RAM in a transitory manner to assemble partial query results into a complete answer that's returned to the user.
trans-unit.target: 用户模块的主要目的是处理并发量伸缩。它从不直接接触数据库文件,也不需要对数据库文件进行可见性。它以短暂的方式使用机器的RAM,将部分查询结果组装成一个完整的答案,并返回给用户。

trans-unit.source: The primary reason that Mariabackup needs to be able to encrypt and decrypt data is that it needs to apply InnoDB redo log records to make the data consistent when the backup is prepared. As a consequence, Mariabackup does not perform many encryption or decryption operations when the backup is initially taken. MariaDB performs more encryption and decryption operations when the backup is prepared. This means that some encryption-related problems (such as using the wrong encryption keys) may not become apparent until the backup is prepared.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup需要能够加密和解密数据的主要原因是，它需要应用InnoDB重做日志记录以在准备备份时使数据一致。因此，最初进行备份时，Mariabackup不会执行许多加密或解密操作。准备备份后，MariaDB将执行更多的加密和解密操作。这意味着在准备备份之前，某些与加密有关的问题（例如使用错误的加密密钥）可能不会变得明显。

trans-unit.source: The primary use case for this algorithm is when the data is significantly larger than will fit into cache (the buffer_pool). Hence, the main goal is to minimize the number of disk hits.
trans-unit.target: 该算法的主要用途是当数据明显大于缓存(buffer_pool)时。因此,主要目标是尽量减少磁盘点击次数。

trans-unit.source: The privileges required for executing statements within f() need to be checked when f() executes. This might mean that privileges are needed for p1() or p2(), depending on the execution path within f(). Those privileges must be checked at runtime, and the user who must possess the privileges is determined by the SQL SECURITY values of the view v and the function f().
trans-unit.target: 当f()执行时,需要检查执行f()内语句所需的特权。这可能意味着p1()或p2()需要特权,这取决于f()内的执行路径。这些权限必须在运行时进行检查,必须拥有权限的用户由视图v和函数f()的SQL SECURITY值决定。

trans-unit.source: The problem is that CONNECT cannot guess what you want to do with arrays. trans-unit.source: The purge batch size is defined as the number of InnoDB redo log records that must be written before triggering purge. The purge batch size can be set by configuring the innodb_purge_batch_size system variable. This system variable can be specified as a command-line argument to mysqld or it can be specified in a relevant server option group in an option file. For example:
trans-unit.target: 清除批处理大小定义为在触发清除之前必须写入的InnoDB重做日志记录的数量。可以通过配置 innodb_purge_batch_size 系统变量来设置清除批处理大小。该系统变量可以指定为 mysqld 的命令行参数，也可以在选项文件中的相关服务器选项组中指定。例如：

trans-unit.source: The purge rollback segment truncation frequency is defined as the number of purge loops that are run before unnecessary rollback segments are truncated. The purge rollback segment truncation frequency can be set by configuring the innodb_purge_rseg_truncate_frequency system variable. This system variable can be changed dynamically with SET GLOBAL. For example:
trans-unit.target: 清除回滚段截断频率定义为在不必要的回滚段被截断之前运行的清除循环数。可以通过配置 innodb_purge_rseg_truncate_frequency 系统变量来设置清除回滚段截断频率。可以使用 SET GLOBAL 动态更改此系统变量。例如：

trans-unit.source: The purge thread deletes the rows in the undo log which are not needed by any existing view. The rows for which a most recent version exists are deleted, as well as the delete-marked rows.
trans-unit.target: 清理线程会删除撤销日志中任何现有视图都不需要的行。存在最新版本的行以及有删除标记的行都会被删除。

trans-unit.source: The purge thread will physically delete index keys and rows, but the free space introduced is still not returned to operating system. This can lead to gaps in the pages. If you have variable length rows, new rows may be larger than old rows and cannot make use of the available space.
trans-unit.target: 清理线程会物理地删除索引键和行,但引入的空闲空间仍然没有返回给操作系统。这可能会导致页面出现空白。如果你有可变长度的行,新行可能会比旧行大,无法利用可用空间。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the binary log is to allow replication, where data is sent from one or more masters to one or more slave servers based on the contents of the binary log, as well as assisting in backup operations.
trans-unit.target: 二进制日志的目的是允许复制，其中根据二进制日志的内容将数据从一个或多个主服务器发送到一个或多个从属服务器，并协助备份操作。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this optimization is to provide the means to terminate the execution of SELECT statements which examine too many rows, and thus use too many resources. This is achieved through an extension of the LIMIT clause —LIMIT ROWS EXAMINED number_of_rows . Whenever possible the semantics of LIMIT ROWS EXAMINED is the same as that of normal LIMIT (for instance for aggregate functions).
trans-unit.target: 此优化的目的是提供一种方法来终止 SELECT 语句的执行，该语句检查太多的行，从而使用太多的资源。这是通过扩展 LIMIT 子句 LIMIT ROWS EXAMINED number_of_rows 来实现的。只要有可能的语义 LIMIT ROWS EXAMINED 是相同的正常 LIMIT （例如用于聚合函数）。

trans-unit.source: The queries
trans-unit.target: 查询

trans-unit.source: The query associated to the DECLARE CURSOR is executed when OPEN is executed. It is important to remember this if the query produces an error, or calls functions which have side effects.
trans-unit.target: 当OPEN被执行时,与DECLARE CURSOR相关联的查询会被执行。如果查询产生错误,或者调用有副作用的函数,请记住这一点。

trans-unit.source: The query cache also needs to be disabled for MariaDB Galera cluster versions prior to "5.5.40-galera", "10.0.14-galera" and "10.1.2".
trans-unit.target: 对于“ 5.5.40-galera”，“ 10.0.14-galera”和“ 10.1.2”之前的MariaDB Galera集群版本，也需要禁用查询缓存。

trans-unit.source: The query cache can be used when tables have a write lock (which may seem confusing since write locks should avoid table reads). This behaviour can be changed by setting the query_cache_wlock_invalidate system variable to ON, in which case each write lock will invalidate the table query cache. Setting to OFF, the default, means that cached queries can be returned even when a table lock is being held. For example:
trans-unit.target: 当表具有写锁时可以使用查询缓存（由于写锁应避免表读取，这可能会造成混淆）。可以通过将 query_cache_wlock_invalidate 系统变量设置为 ON 来更改此行为，在这种情况下，每个写锁都将使表查询缓存无效。设置为 OFF （默认值）意味着即使持有表锁，也可以返回缓存的查询。例如：

trans-unit.source: The query cache handles transactions. Internally a flag (FLAGS_IN_TRANS) is set to 0 when a query was executed outside a transaction, and to 1 when the query was inside a transaction (BEGIN / COMMIT / ROLLBACK). This flag is part of the "query cache hash", in others words one query inside a transaction is different from a query outside a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 查询缓存处理事务。在内部在事务外部执行查询时将标志（FLAGS_IN_TRANS）设置为0，在事务内部（BEGIN / COMMIT / ROLLBACK）时将标志设置为1 。此标志是“查询缓存哈希”的一部分，换句话说，事务内部的一个查询与事务外部的一个查询不同。

trans-unit.source: The query cache is not used by the Spider storage engine (amongst others).
trans-unit.target: Spider存储引擎（以及其他存储引擎）不使用查询缓存。

trans-unit.source: The query cache stores results of SELECT queries so that if the identical query is received in future, the results can be quickly returned.
trans-unit.target: 查询缓存存储了SELECT查询的结果,这样以后如果收到相同的查询,可以快速返回结果。

trans-unit.source: The query result is stored using a minimum block size of query_cache_min_res_unit. Check two conditions to use a good value of this variable: Query cache insert result blocks with locks, each new block insert lock query cache, a small value will increase locks and fragmentation and waste less memory for small results, a big value will increase memory use wasting more memory for small results but it reduce locks. Test with your workload for fine tune this variable.
trans-unit.target: 使用最小块大小 query_cache_min_res_unit 来存储查询结果。检查两个条件以使用该变量的适当值：查询高速缓存插入具有锁的结果块，每个新块插入锁定查询高速缓存，较小的值将增加锁和碎片，并为较小的结果浪费较少的内存，较大的值将增加内存使用会浪费更多的内存以获得较小的结果，但会减少锁定。测试您的工作负载以微调此变量。

trans-unit.source: The queued rows are held only in memory until they are inserted into the table. This means that if you terminate mysqld forcibly (for example, with kill -9) or if mysqld dies unexpectedly, any queued rows that have not been written to disk are lost.
trans-unit.target: 排队的记录只保留在内存中,直到它们被插入到表中。这意味着,如果你强行终止mysqld(例如,用kill -9),或者mysqld意外死亡,任何没有写入磁盘的排队行都会丢失。

trans-unit.source: The rank window function allows for ranking or assigning a numeric order value based on the window function definition. Using the Rank() function will result in the same value for ties / equal values and the next rank value skipped. The Dense_Rank() function behaves similarly except the next consecutive number is used after a tie rather than skipped. The Row_Number() function will provide a unique ordering value. The example query shows the Rank() function being applied to rank sales reps by the number of opportunities for Q4 2016.
trans-unit.target: 排名窗口函数允许根据窗口函数定义进行排名或分配一个数字顺序值。使用Rank()函数将导致平局/等值的值相同,并跳过下一个排名值。Dense_Rank()函数的行为类似,只是在平局后使用下一个连续的数字,而不是跳过。Row_Number()函数将提供一个唯一的排序值。示例查询显示了应用Rank()函数按2016年第四季度的机会数对销售代表进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The real data type of TYPE OF and ROW TYPE OF table_name will become known at the very beginning of the stored routine call. trans-unit.target: TYPE OF 和 ROW TYPE OF table_name 的实际数据类型将在存储的例程调用的开始就知道。即使在ALTER TABLE或DROP TABLE语句之后声明了变量，即使当前变量在锚中出现的表上的当前例程中执行，ALTER TABLE或DROP TABLE语句也不会影响锚定变量的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The real data type of a ROW TYPE OF cursor_name variable will become known when execution enters into the block where the variable is declared. Data type instantiation will happen only once. In a cursor ROW TYPE OF variable that is declared inside a loop, its data type will become known on the very first iteration and won't change on further loop iterations.
trans-unit.target: 当执行进入声明该变量的块时，将知道 ROW TYPE OF cursor_name 变量的实际数据类型。数据类型实例化只会发生一次。在循环内声明的游标 ROW TYPE OF 变量中，其数据类型将在第一次迭代时就已知，并且在以后的循环迭代中不会更改。

trans-unit.source: The real problems occur with outward tables, in particular when they are created from already existing files. The first issue is to make the partition table use the correct existing file names. The second one, only for already existing not void tables, is to be sure the partitioning function match the distribution of the data already existing in the files.
trans-unit.target: 真正的问题发生在外向表上,特别是当它们从已经存在的文件中创建时。第一个问题是要使分区表使用正确的已有文件名。第二个,只针对已经存在的不虚表,就是要确保分区功能与文件中已经存在的数据分布相匹配。

trans-unit.source: The real work of Flashback is done by mysqlbinlog with --flashback. This causes events to be translated: INSERT to DELETE, DELETE to INSERT, and for UPDATEs the before and after images are swapped.
trans-unit.target: 闪回的实际工作由 mysqlbinlog 与 --flashback 一起完成。这将导致事件被转换：从INSERT到DELETE，从DELETE到INSERT，并且对于UPDATE，交换之前和之后的图像。

trans-unit.source: The reason for the above change is that MariaDB is using the newer Aria storage engine for disk based temporary files instead of MyISAM. The main benefit of Aria is that it can cache both indexes and rows and thus gives better performance than MyISAM for large queries.
trans-unit.target: 进行上述更改的原因是MariaDB 对基于磁盘的临时文件而不是MyISAM 使用了更新的Aria存储引擎。Aria的主要好处是它可以同时缓存索引和行，因此对于大型查询，它的性能比MyISAM好。

trans-unit.source: The records of the first operand are written into the join buffer one by one until the buffer is full.
trans-unit.target: 第一个操作数的记录被逐一写入加入缓冲区,直到缓冲区满为止。

trans-unit.source: The records of the second operand are read from the base/temporary table one by one. For every read record r2 of table t2 the join buffer is scanned, and, for any record r1 from the buffer such that r2 matches r1 the concatenation of the interesting fields of r1 and r2 is sent to the result stream of the corresponding partial join.
trans-unit.target: 从基表/临时表逐一读取第二个操作数的记录。对于表t2的每一条读到的记录r2,联接缓冲区被扫描,对于缓冲区中的任何记录r1,如果r2与r1匹配,则r1和r2的有趣字段的连接被发送到相应的部分联接的结果流中。

trans-unit.source: The restore process for partial backups is quite different than the process for full backups. A partial backup is not a completely functional data directory. The data dictionary in the InnoDB system tablespace will still contain entries for the databases and tables that were not included in the backup.
trans-unit.target: 部分备份的还原过程与完全备份的过程完全不同。部分备份不是功能完整的数据目录。InnoDB系统表空间中的数据字典仍将包含未包含在备份中的数据库和表的条目。

trans-unit.source: The restore process for restoring individual tables and/or partitions is quite different than the process for full backups.
trans-unit.target: 还原单个表和/或分区的还原过程与完全备份的过程完全不同。

trans-unit.source: The result of EXCEPT is all records of the left SELECT result except records which are in right SELECT result set, i.e. it is subtraction of two result sets.

trans-unit.source: The result of EXCEPT is all records of the left SELECT result set except records which are in right SELECT result set, i.e. it is subtraction of two result sets.

trans-unit.source: The result of an intersect is the intersection of right and left SELECT results, i.e. only records that are present in both result sets will be included in the result of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 相交的结果是左右 SELECT 结果的交集，即，仅两个结果集中都存在的记录将包括在运算结果中。

trans-unit.source: The result of such an architecture is a natural "commit grouping" - If commits are coming faster than the system can sync, they do not stall. Instead, all commits that came since the last sync are logged to the same "active" page, and they all are synced with the next - one - sync. Thus, thought individual commits are delayed, throughput is not decreasing.
trans-unit.target: 这种架构的结果是一种自然的 "提交分组"--如果提交的速度超过了系统同步的速度,它们就不会停滞。相反,上次同步后的所有提交都会被记录到同一个 "活动 "页面,并与下一次同步同步。因此,虽然单个提交被延迟了,但吞吐量并没有减少。

trans-unit.source: The resulting module, for instance mongo.so or mongo.dll, must be placed in the plugin directory of the MariaDB server. Then, you will be able to use MONGO like tables simply replacing in the CREATE TABLE statement the option TABLE_TYPE=MONGO with TABLE_TYPE=OEM SUBTYPE=MONGO MODULE=’mongo.(so|dll)’. Actually, the module name, here supposedly ‘mongo’, can be anything you like.
trans-unit.target: 生成的模块（例如 mongo.so 或 mongo.dll ）必须放置在MariaDB服务器的插件目录中。然后，您将能够像使用MONGO一样使用表，只需在CREATE TABLE语句中将 TABLE_TYPE=MONGO 选项替换为 TABLE_TYPE=OEM SUBTYPE=MONGO MODULE=’mongo.(so|dll)’ 。实际上，模块名称（此处为“ mongo”）可以是您喜欢的任何名称。

trans-unit.source: The resulting module, for instance rest.so or rest.dll, must be placed in the plugin directory of the MariaDB server. Then, you will be able to use NoSQL tables simply replacing in the CREATE TABLE statement the TABLE_TYPE option =JSON or XML by TABLE_TYPE=OEM SUBTYPE=REST MODULE=’rest.(so|dll)’. Actually, the module name, here supposedly ‘rest’, can be anything you like.
trans-unit.target: 生成的模块（例如rest.so或rest.dll）必须放置在MariaDB服务器的插件目录中。然后，您将能够使用NoSQL表，只需在CREATE TABLE语句中将TABLE_TYPE选项= JSON或XML替换为TABLE_TYPE = OEM SUBTYPE = REST MODULE ='rest。（so | dll）'。实际上，模块名称（这里称为“ rest”）可以是您喜欢的任何名称。

trans-unit.source: The results of SHOW WARNINGS and SHOW COUNT(*) WARNINGS are directly sent to the client. If you need to access those information in a stored program, you can use the GET DIAGNOSTICS statement instead.
trans-unit.target: 结果 SHOW WARNINGS 和 SHOW COUNT(*) WARNINGS 被直接发送到客户端。如果需要访问存储程序中的那些信息，则可以改用 GET DIAGNOSTICS 语句。

trans-unit.source: The results show some statistics for the values returned by the query, and propose an optimal data type for the columns. This can be helpful for checking your existing tables, or after importing new data. You may need to try different settings for the arguments so that PROCEDURE ANALYSE() does not suggest the ENUM data type when it is not appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 结果显示了查询返回的值的一些统计数据,并为列提出了一个最佳的数据类型。这对于检查你现有的表,或者在导入新的数据之后很有帮助。您可能需要尝试对参数进行不同的设置,这样PROCEDURE ANALYSE()就不会在不合适的时候建议使用ENUM数据类型。
